resources.string: Press \"Export Database\" to save all data from your database into an external .csv file. \n The file will be saved to your SD Card under \"\\ReverseChecklist\\DatabaseExport\\\"
Exporting data to csv completed successfully!
Exporting data to csv failed :( Please try again\…

Press \"Import Database\" to pick a .csv file with ReverseChecklist data. See Help for more info about expected file format. \nThis feature requires a file manager (like Astro Folders) to be installed.
Import Failed! The selected file was invalid.
Import Failed! The selected file did not contain data in expected format. See help for more info.
Import Failed! The selected file was empty.
Import Failed! Please try a different file. See help for more info about importing files.

The import mode determines how to handle duplicate lists. If there already exist a list with the same name as the imported list, \'Rename List\' will cause the imported list to be renamed, while \'Merge Lists\' will merge the existing and imported list, skipping duplicate entries.
